definition: A substance or source that provides essential nutrients and is commonly consumed to support growth, repair, and maintenance of body tissues. It is typically derived from various animal or plant sources and is a fundamental component of a balanced diet.

examples.english: Soy milk is a protein source.
Meat is a good protein source.
Eggs are a natural protein source.

examples.german: Pflanzliche Proteine sind eine gesunde Proteinquelle.
examples.english: Plant-based proteins are a healthy protein source.
